title: NFL Draft QB Prospect Week: Why is Zach Wilson drawing some comparisons to Patrick Mahomes? (Football 4/13)
description:
Zach Wilson saw a meteoric rise up draft boards during the 2020 season, all while playing at BYU. Now the consensus #2 QB and #2 pick, there's a lot to uncover about Wilson's game and to do that, Will Brinson chats with Josh Edwards for a complete quarterback profile. Josh breaks down strengths and weaknesses of Wilson's game, some of his pro comparisons and how ready he is to step in right away if in fact the Jets do select him 2nd overall. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
